They may not give a shit about me, but its all cool, cause I dont too much care about anyone or anything else myself, I have said on more than one accosion I hate everyone, just try to get along with most but mentally challegened people like yourself I dont. item.title: Can someone make this a random?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

i have the impautotalker

and i was wondering if it could be turned into a random chatter

so make this impautotalker file a random like the plyrchat random??

also can u have it so u can change different things in the impautotalker like add different bits
like this:- i added that but dont know if it will work someone tell me??

private int RESPOND_WAIT_TIME = 60;//in seconds How often we can respond. private String RESPOND_TO = "hi, hello"; boolean RESPOND_TO_YOUR_NAME=true; //strings to say in respone, picked at random // playername=person who talked // message=what they said private String RESPONSES = "hello,hi there, hey !";

anyway main point is can someone make it into a random ??
